name: Magnet Fishing
description:
Controls: 

A and D to rotate your magnet, W moves forward, S moves backward

=======Hooked======

when a fish is on the magnet use A/D to move the magnet to the opposite side of the fish to pull against the fish. press LShift to use fuel to get a boost of speed. boosting uses power and can break your magnet. 

Description:

Magnet Fishing is a short game made over the course of 72 hours for the Score Space Game Jam. It is a small little game where you catch fish with your magnet, to score point, to buy upgrades, to catch more fish, to score more points, etc.
